title: I'm P1, stuck in S1.
body:
Edit: all the people commenting are lovely low elos who have no idea what planet they're on. Haven't even heard of opgg. Feels good, man.

Discuss how marvellous the new MMR system is :)

replies.body: If your MMR or skill was actually P1, you would easily have a 60-70% winrate and not be stuck in S1. Chances are your first promos would skip you straight to gold. Took me about a dozen games to go across the entire division last year between MMR adjustment and skipping subdivisions, and i am absolutely not faker.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHzzvrv3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-02-23T00:16:49.742+0000)
>
> If your MMR or skill was actually P1, you would easily have a 60-70% winrate and not be stuck in S1. Chances are your first promos would skip you straight to gold. Took me about a dozen games to go across the entire division last year between MMR adjustment and skipping subdivisions, and i am absolutely not faker.

The more I read these forums, the more I realize that I shouldn't because I value my brain cells.

> [{quoted}](name=Great Lad,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHzzvrv3,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2020-02-23T00:56:07.567+0000)
>
> The more I read these forums, the more I realize that I shouldn't because I value my brain cells.

superiority complex much?
Wait a sec...you have brain cells? You aren't showing us them.
Last year new system was implemented though.

And why do you think you are P1? 
You were g3 in season 8. Unless we are talking about another account?
There is no "new MMR system" it's the same since season 3.

> [{quoted}](name=Saezio,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHzzvrv3,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2020-02-23T02:29:13.834+0000)
>
> And why do you think you are P1? 
> You were g3 in season 8. Unless we are talking about another account?
> There is no "new MMR system" it's the same since season 3.

It's not, riot admitedly toned down the MMR scaling in a controversial way to fight smurfs back in  season 8/9 if i'm not mistaken
Then admitted further that they guy who said MMR is toned down was misinformed.
There (probably) isn't a new MMR system. You aren't plat 1.

> [{quoted}](name=Darkdemon653,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHzzvrv3,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2020-02-23T00:19:25.273+0000)
>
> There (probably) isn't a new MMR system. You aren't plat 1.

You can literally go to my profile and see I was P1/D4-3 MMR last season.

Hello?
Really? https://eune.op.gg/summoner/userName=Great+Lad  Hmmm that says you were once Gold 3 in Season 8.

My guy. You were G3 in season 8. You didn't even play ranked last season. You're "stuck" in Silver 1 (Gold 4 now I suppose) because you have a 42% winrate.

Where did you get the P1 from bud?
Smurfs roaming all around in Silver. All master players smurfing because they are unhappy in their elo.
What rank are the opponents you're getting?
your silver, if you were d4-d3 last year and cant climb out of silver then there's really nothing to say
